trans-unit.source: Provides data for <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving" /> and the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving" /> e <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> event occurs when the user is moving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> evento ocorre quando o usuário está se movendo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> event occurs when the user finishes moving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> evento ocorre quando o usuário termina de mover o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs> class specifies the position of the mouse pointer and the position of the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs> classe especifica a posição do ponteiro do mouse e a posição do canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> named `SplitContainer1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> chamado `SplitContainer1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> evento.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X do ponteiro do mouse (nas coordenadas de cliente).

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Y do ponteiro do mouse (nas coordenadas de cliente).

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" /> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X do canto superior esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" /> (nas coordenadas de cliente).

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" /> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Y do canto superior esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" /> (nas coordenadas de cliente).

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs" /> class with the specified coordinates of the mouse pointer and the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs" /> com as coordenadas especificadas do ponteiro do mouse e as coordenadas do canto superior esquerdo do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" /> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada X do canto superior esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" /> (nas coordenadas de cliente).

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitY%2A> property of this class to determine the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitY%2A> propriedade dessa classe para determinar a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> os eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> named `SplitContainer1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> chamado `SplitContainer1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" /> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada Y do canto superior esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter" /> (nas coordenadas de cliente).

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do canto superior esquerdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitX%2A> property of this class to determine the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitX%2A> propriedade dessa classe para determinar a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> os eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada X do ponteiro do mouse (nas coordenadas de cliente).

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.Y%2A> property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.Y%2A> propriedade dessa classe para determinar o local atual do ponteiro do mouse quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> os eventos são gerados.
